name: Elementary (Cptn_Turtle)
description:
Submission to ACM Game Dev's Late Fall 2022 Game Jam

Theme: Elements

Test your reflexes and your knowledge in this action/quiz game!

Credits

Sound and Music retrieved from opengameart.org:

Underwater Theme by Cleyton Kauffman

Crystal Cave by cynicmusic

At the End of Hope by Emme_MA

Heatstroke by Jesús Lastra

Completion Sound by Brandon Morris

Wrong Sound Effect by KonitaTutorials
